item.title: #GI2019 2019 11 06
item.description: Day 1 Genome Informatica 2019 at CSHL Bold is the speaker 349 attendees. Largest? 189 posters 39 (?) talks 90 countries, 20 (US) states High(est) % female, URM for gi Night 1 Comparative 3D genome organization in Apicomplexan parasites Evelien M. Bunnik, Aarthi Venkat, Ferhat Ay, Karine G. Le Roch. Apicomplexan parasites: toxoplasma gondii babesia most prevalent nad morbidity causing pathogens Try to understand at genomic level
